typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cpais as string,
		brand as string,
		vin as string,
		secviceContract as string,
		mttht as string,
		cumprel as string,
		mtcom as string,
		rem as string,
		status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVsource
source(output(
		Skey as integer,
		brand as string,
		chasis_num as string,
		s_contract as string,
		cumprel as string,
		mtcom as string,
		rem as string,
		status as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLcem
CSVsource derive(isActive = 1) ~> isActivederived
SQLcem select(mapColumn(
		SQLSkey = Skey,
		SQLbrand = brand,
		SQLchasis_num = chasis_num,
		SQLs_contract = s_contract,
		SQLcumprel = cumprel,
		SQLmtcom = mtcom,
		SQLrem = rem,
		SQLstatus = status,
		SQLisActive = isActive
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
CSVsource, Rename lookup(vin == SQLchasis_num,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupinSQL
LookupinSQL filter(!isNull(status)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		SQLSkey,
		SQLbrand,
		SQLchasis_num,
		SQLs_contract,
		SQLcumprel,
		SQLmtcom,
		SQLrem,
		SQLstatus
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(isActive = 0) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
isActivederived sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Skey as integer,
		brand as string,
		chasis_num as string,
		s_contract as string,
		cumprel as string,
		mtcom as string,
		rem as string,
		status as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Skey as integer,
		brand as string,
		chasis_num as string,
		s_contract as string,
		cumprel as string,
		mtcom as string,
		rem as string,
		status as string,
		isActive as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Skey = SQLSkey,
		brand = SQLbrand,
		chasis_num = SQLchasis_num,
		s_contract = SQLs_contract,
		cumprel = SQLcumprel,
		mtcom = SQLmtcom,
		rem = SQLrem,
		status = SQLstatus,
		isActive
	)) ~> sink2
